channel.title: Computers on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Computers on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: WAN
item.description: heh. I am sitting in my kitchen typing this. I have finally got one of my computers to work. it rules. i love computers. this one is so small and tiny. i am happy. as soon as I get my case in the mail I will be able to introduce it to the world. weee.
